devdoc.author: Juan Castellon
devdoc.details: CompanyFactory is a factory pattern implemented via a Library, that  will be used to create new companies. It will basically conglomerate all the logic related to companies creation and it's business rules.  At the moment creates instances for every request without any  validation, but the plan is to add all business rules here to create  companies.

createCompany(CompanyFactory.Data storag.details: First we find the first position available in the companies array,  if there is at least one available position for this owner address  (max 3 per owner), we create the company, add it to the companies  array and return it. As this is a library we will inherit the  context of the contract that is calling it (Platform), this is due  to the nature of low level calls to libraries (delegatecall).

params.aCompanyName: string with the name to use for this company.
params.aDid: string with company's uPort DID (not used yet).
params.aPhone: string with the phone number for this company.
params.aUrl: string with the URL for this company.
params.self: This function will receive the object (where the data is  stored) they are called on as their first parameter.

nextCompanyAvailablePosition(CompanyFact.details: Looks for the next available position in the companies array and  returns that position.

params.self: This function will receive the object (where the data is  stored) they are called on as their first parameter.

nextCompanyAvailablePosition(CompanyFact.return: next available position in the companies array or MAX_OWNER_COMPANIES if no position available.

devdoc.title: Library to create companies on the platform
